the classic antiabortion argument and the pro-choice argument favored by
most philosophers both face problems that are mirror images of one another.
A stand-off results. The abortion debate requires a different strategy.
The “Future Like Ours” Account of the Wrongness of Killing
Why do the standard arguments in the abortion debate fail to resolve the 
issue? The general principles to which partisans in the debate appeal are
